### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Offshore Pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump (position -10.5, 25.5)

### Boiler at position(-34.5, 30.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -34.5, 30.0)

### Steam Engine at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine (position -29.5, 30.5)

### Pipe Groups
Consists of the following entities:
- Pipe Group (fluid_system=63499, position -24.5, -51.5)
- Pipe Group (fluid_system=63500, fluid=water, position -10.5, 23.5)
- Pipe Group (fluid_system=63503, position -2.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group (fluid_system=63504, position -36.5, 29.5)

### Electricity Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity Group (id=306088, various small electric poles)

### Labs
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position not specified, status=NO_POWER)
- Lab (position not specified, status=NO_POWER)

### Furnaces
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing attributes in objects
- Ensure that the attributes you are trying to access on an object exist. For example, the `PipeGroup` object does not have a `fluid_system` attribute. Verify the object structure in the documentation before accessing attributes.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power connections
- Check that all power-consuming entities are properly connected to a power network to avoid issues like "no power".
